info.desc: Newly developed Neat Template provides a stylish and fresh look for you to design more stunning page-flipping eBooks. In Neat Template, you can add brand logo in the top toolbar, set different featured buttons, show or hide transparent thumbnails at bottom, enable Social Share via different channels, etc. Neat presentation interface, neat control panels and neat reading manner help to build your neat feeling publications.

property.title: Toolbar Settings
property.desc: Set options for the buttons and icons on the Toolbar.

property.title: Toolbar Background Color
property.desc: Set the Flash bar color

property.title: Toolbar Background Image
property.desc: Select a background (image or swf ) for the tool bar.The Image or Swf will be scale to the fit the size of the tool bar.

property.title: Transparent Toolbar
property.desc: Set The bar as transparent or not. When it's transparent, the bar color and the bar background file will not be shown at all.

property.title: Show Separators
property.desc: Show the bevel or not.

property.title: Form Font Color
property.desc: Set Font color for search, table of content, thumbnail, print, about, help etc.

property.title: Form Background Color
property.desc: Set background color for search, table of content, thumbnail, print, about, help etc.

property.title: Toolbar Logo
property.desc: Define settings for the Title Bar

property.title: Logo Image
property.desc: The logo icon will be added in front of the bar, and the height is fixed to 55 pixels, the width will be adjusted acording to the scale.

property.title: Logo Link
property.desc: The page URL that will open when the user click the Logo

property.title: Open in...
property.desc: Set logo links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the flash.

property.title: Toolbar Buttons
property.desc: Set button status on the Toolbar.

property.title: Home Button
property.desc: Home page button settings

property.title: Show Home Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Home button. (When Page URL is empty, the button will hide )

property.title: Home Button Link
property.desc: Home page URL (When this value is empty, the Home Button will always hide)

property.title: Open in...
property.desc: Set hyper links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the flash.

property.title: About Button
property.desc: About/Contact button config

property.title: Show About Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the About button

property.title: Add Content
property.desc: The Content of the about/contact

property.title: Show Full Screen Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Full Screen button

property.title: Full Screen with keyboard input
property.desc: This setting is to enable keyboard input in full screen mode. However, when Flash Player version is lower than 11.0, keyboard input will be invalid even though you enable this setting.

property.title: Tips for the Full Screen
property.desc: Show the Full Screen Button on the First Page

property.title: Help Button
property.desc: Help settings

property.title: Show Help Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Help button

property.title: Add Content
property.desc: The help content file for Help Window. If it's empty, Help Button will not show.

property.title: Print Button
property.desc: Print settings

property.title: Show Print Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable Print button

property.title: Watermark Image
property.desc: Watermark image or SWF only show in printed pages but won't show while viewing

property.title: Print Limit
property.desc: This setting lets you define the printing page range on the Print Panel. You can decide which page(s) can be printed or cannot be printed. E.g, if you input “1”, then the first page cannot be printed; if you input “1-10”, then page 1 to page 10 (totally 10 pages) cannot be print; if you input “1,6-8,15”, then page 1, page 6, page 7, page 8 and page 15 cannot be printed. P.S.: Once this feature is enabled, the option “Print All Pages” will not show on the Print Panel and the input format will be restricted to as either of followings: (1) 1; (2) 2-15; (3) 1,6,10-15,3. If the page range input box is left blank, it will by default allow printing all pages.

property.title: Current Page by Default
property.desc: Set "Print Current Page" as default option or not.

property.title: Download Settings
property.desc: Attached files and download settings

property.title: Sound Button
property.desc: Sound settings...

property.title: Show Sound Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable sound

property.title: Sound File
property.desc: Select a background sound for the book.

property.title: Number of Repeats
property.desc: Set -1: Play background music all the time. Set N (N>0): Play N times then stop.

property.title: Sound Volume
property.desc: Set the volume of background. Set -1 to use the default volume. The value should be between 0 to 100. 0.3 is recommended.

property.title: Page Flipping Sound Volume
property.desc: Set the volume of page flipping sound when the book is flipping. Set -1 to use the default volume. The value should be between 0 to 100. 0.2 is recommended.

property.title: Zoom Button
property.desc: Settings of Document view (zoom) mode

property.title: Show Zoom Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable Document mode

property.title: Start in Zoom Mode
property.desc: Show the document view or flipping page view by default when the book shows up

property.title: Minimum Zoom Width
property.desc: The minimum width (in pixel) within which the page can be zoomed out in document mode.

property.title: Maximum Zoom Width
property.desc: The Maximum width (in pixel) within which the page can be zoomed in when in document mode.

property.title: Default Zoom Width
property.desc: The default size (in pixel) when the page zoom in.The minimum of this value should be Minimum Zoom Width and the maximum should be Maximum Zoom Width.

property.title: Double Page Mode
property.desc: Show two pages while choosing Document Mode.

property.title: Drag in Zoom Mode
property.desc: Enables zoom dragging, or the zoom page will be move around as the mouse moving.

property.title: Search Button
property.desc: Define options for Search Button

property.title: Show Search Button
property.desc: Show/Hide Search Button

property.title: Search Results Highlight Color
property.desc: The color of the found words.

property.title: Minimum Search Characters
property.desc: Set the least number of search characters

property.title: Restrict Search Results
property.desc: Once set it to yes, search results will only display pages that contain all the keywords readers have input

property.title: Sharing Settings
property.desc: Define share channels and settings

property.title: Share by Email Button
property.desc: Share button config

property.title: Show Share by Email Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Share button

property.title: Email Subject
property.desc: The subject of email

property.title: Email Message
property.desc: The body of email. Use {link} to represent the URL/link of the book

property.title: Show Social Share Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the social share button

property.title: Social Share Settings
property.desc: Display specified or customized social share links

property.title: Custom Social Share Link
property.desc: You can set a special link in the social share window

property.title: Show Embed Code
property.desc: Description: You may show or hide the iframe code of sharing the flipbook in the "Social Share" option.

property.title: Language Button
property.desc: Set the language for flash.

property.title: Language
property.desc: Select language for flash

property.title: Switchable
property.desc: Set the flash language switchable or not

property.title: Auto Flip Button
property.desc: Auto flipping settings

property.title: Show Auto Flip Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable auto flip button

property.title: Page Flipping Interval
property.desc: Auto Flip interval in seconds

property.title: Number of Repeats
property.desc: Auto flip loop count. Set this value to -1 to play ceaselessly.

property.title: Auto Flip at Startup
property.desc: Auto flip when start up.

property.title: Show Annotations Button
property.desc: Set if readers can add annotations on pages or not when thay read the book.

property.title: Bookmarks Button
property.desc: Show/Hide Button

property.title: Show Backward Button
property.desc: Show/Hide go to back button

property.title: Show Forward Button
property.desc: Show/Hide go forward button

property.title: Show Copy Text Button
property.desc: Once you enable Search and this Copy Text feature at the same time, readers can use "CTRL + C" key combinations to copy the text of the PDF flipbook.

property.title: Show Crop Tool Button
property.desc: Enable/disable crop the flipping-book for downloading or printing

property.title: Magnifier Button
property.desc: Show magnifier button

property.title: Click Background to Flip Pages
property.desc: Enable/disable clicking the background to turn the flipping-book

property.title: Button Settings
property.desc: Define settings for the button icons

property.title: Show Navigation Arrows
property.desc: Show / Hide Big Icon

property.title: Button Color
property.desc: Button icon color

property.title: Navigation Arrow Color
property.desc: Big Button icon color

property.title: Buttons Editor
property.desc: Replace toolbar buttons with your own icon.

property.title: Arrow Background Color
property.desc: Setting of Big Button Background Color.

property.title: Arrow Opacity
property.desc: Setting of Big Button Background Alpha.

property.title: Arrow Opacity on Hover
property.desc: Setting of Big Button Background Hover Alpha

property.title: Flash Display Settings
property.desc: Customize template for page-flipping eBooks

property.title: Book Display Settings
property.desc: Customize the state of the flipbook

property.title: Show Display Mode Button
property.desc: Show / Hide Book Display Mode Button.

property.title: Flip Mode Settings
property.desc: Flip, Single Page, Slide

property.title: Display Mode Panel Setting
property.desc: Display Mode Panel Setting

property.title: Show Singlepage Mode Button
property.desc: Enable / Dispaly Single Page Mode.

property.title: Show Slideshow Mode Button
property.desc: Enable / Disable Slide Mode.

property.title: Slide Mode Settings
property.desc: Slide Mode Settings

property.title: Enable Vertical Scrolling
property.desc: Toggle between Vertical and Horizontal page browsing mode.

property.title: Vertical Scrolling by Default
property.desc: Set vertical browsing option as default or not.

property.title: Enable Double Page Mode
property.desc: Enale/Disable Double Page

property.title: Double Page Mode by Default
property.desc: Show Double/Single Page as Default

property.title: Page Thickness
property.desc: Set page thickness, None: no thickness.

property.title: Page Thickness Color
property.desc: Sets color for pages thickness.

property.title: Page Corner Size
property.desc: Configure the area that shows flipping status at the corner when mouse is over around the book corner. (None means no page corner flip effect.)

property.title: Background Opacity
property.desc: Values should be between 0 and 1. Set the Alpha value to control the transparency of the background in flip book. For example, you can set the value as "0" to make the book background as transparent completely, when you embed the book in other HTML page, it will show the background of the HTML only.

property.title: Always Center the Book
property.desc: Set Yes to retain Flip Book in the Center of the Window

property.title: Show Animated Page Corner
property.desc: Show the Corner Flip Effect at the beginning to let user know they can drag the corner to turn page

property.title: Mouse Drag to Flip Pages
property.desc: Enable Mouse Down to scroll the page to the mouse point automatically

property.title: Mouse Tracing Effect
property.desc: Show Mouse Tracing Effect at the beginning to tell them that they can drag or click the corner to turn page. If the book is configured to be open from the beginning, the Mouse Tracing Effect won't work.

property.title: Show Thumbnails at Startup
property.desc: Set the template so that when you arrive on the page, the thumbnails pallet is opened or not.

property.title: Preloader Settings
property.desc: The preloader for the book

property.title: Restore Previous Session
property.desc: Sets to yes to remembers the last viewed page and ask the reader to open the flipbook on this page or not.

property.title: Right-Click Menu Settings
property.desc: Popup menu when right click on the flipbook

property.title: Font Settings
property.desc: Font settings...

property.title: Buttons
property.desc: Set font types and color for the buttons

property.title: Font Color
property.desc: Button text font color

property.title: Button Font
property.desc: Font family for button text

property.title: Page Number Color
property.desc: Customize Page Index Font Color

property.title: Basic Font Color
property.desc: The color of the search/bookmark text.

property.title: Button Highlight color on Hover
property.desc: The highlighted color of the buttons, icons, text field when mouse rolls over.

property.title: Bookmarks Font Color
property.desc: Text color for bookmark

property.title: Background Settings
property.desc: The main background of the book

property.title: Background Color
property.desc: The background color of the book. If you would rather use a background(image or swf) instead of a background color, select an image or swf using the Background File setting.

property.title: Gradient Color A
property.desc: Gradient Color A

property.title: Gradient Color B
property.desc: Gradient Color B

property.title: Gradient Angle
property.desc: Gradient Angle

property.title: Background Image
property.desc: Background settings, if you would rather use a background (image or swf files) instead of a background color, make sure that the Background File is not empty

property.title: Image File
property.desc: Select a background (image or swf ) for the book.

property.title: Image Position
property.desc: The position of the Book's outer window background
property.valueSource: Scale to fit,Full Fill,Fill,Top Left,Top Center,Top Right,Middle Left,Middle Center,Middle Right,Bottom Left,Bottom Center,Bottom Right
property.valueLableSource: Scale to fit,Full Fill,Fill,Top Left,Top Center,Top Right,Middle Left,Middle Center,Middle Right,Bottom Left,Bottom Center,Bottom Right

property.title: Thumbnails Panel Color
property.desc: Set the Thumbnail background color

property.title: Selected Thumbnail Color
property.desc: Set color for the currently selected Thumbnail page

property.title: Page Background Color
property.desc: Set the Page background color

property.title: Page Size Settings
property.desc: Set book proportions

property.title: Page Width
property.desc: Set book width

property.title: Page Height
property.desc: Set book height

property.title: Page Shadow Settings
property.desc: Sets inner side page shadow

property.title: Left Page Shadow
property.desc: Left page shadow width.

property.title: Right Page Shadow
property.desc: Right page shadow width.

property.title: Page Shadow Opacity
property.desc: Set page shadow opacity. Value should be between 0 and 1.

property.title: Cover Page Shadow
property.desc: Show/ Hide shadow of cover page.

property.title: Right-to-left Language
property.desc: Set book right to left for reading( Arabic for example)

property.title: Start on Double-page
property.desc: Set the flipping book to start on double-page or not. If you choose "Yes", the book will display without a frontpage (or cover), presenting simply two pages at a time. If your book has odd number pages, you can try and set this value to YES.

property.title: Hard Cover Settings
property.desc: Cover Setting

property.title: Hard Cover
property.desc: Enable hard cover for the book.

property.title: Hard Cover Border Width
property.desc: Sets the cover border width.

property.title: Border Color
property.desc: Set color for the inner cover border.

property.title: Outer Cover Border
property.desc: Enable outer cover border or not

property.title: Corner Rounding
property.desc: Sets the hard cover to be round, ellipse with the value that you set.

property.title: Show Book Notch
property.desc: Show/ Hide the notch of the book

property.title: Fast Page Flipping
property.desc: Turn "Fast Flip" on or off. "Fast Flip" allows you to flip to next or previous page by clicking the buttons without a break. That means you can flip multiple pages consecutively instead of waiting for a page finishes flipping.

property.title: Page Numbers During FPF
property.desc: Show Page Index in the middle of the book when you are fast flipping the book.

property.title: Page Flipping Time
property.desc: Set page flipping time in seconds. 0.6 second is recommended.

property.title: Flip Pages with Mouse Wheel
property.desc: Enable/Disable to turn page by scrolling the mouse wheel

property.title: Page Numeration
property.desc: Set page number caption.

property.title: Total Pages Caption
property.desc: Specify the total pages number text in the pagination block.

property.title: Page Number Caption
property.desc: Set caption for each page of your book. The format is: "actual page number:caption;". For example, if you set "1:I;2:II;3:III;4:IV;5:V;6:First Unit;7:;8-100:1+", it will show "I" for the first page, "II" the second page, "III" for the third page, "IV" for the forth page, "V" for the fifth page, "First Unit" for the sixth page, empty/nothing shown for the seventh page, then show "1,2,3...93"for page 8 to 100 (1+ means show caption from number 1, and increase 1 corresponding to the later pages). Another example, you have 30 pages book and you want to show page numbers from 3001 to 3030, then you can set caption as "1-30:3001+" The caption value also can be set with Macro: StartPageIndex-EndPageIndex:any string{N/R/r+StartNumber}any other string ("N" means Arabic number, "R" means uppercase Roman number, "r" means lowercase Roman number, "+" means increase progressively). For example ,if you want to show page numbers for a 1000 page book as P6,P7,P8...P1005, you may use this: 1-1000:P{N+6}; if you want to show page number for a 10 page book like, Page I#, Page II#, Page III#, Page IV#... Page X#, you can simply use "1-10:Page {R+}#".

property.title: Minime Style
property.desc: Present Page-flipping eBook pages directly without showing toolbar (especially useful for embedding eBook into a small area/window in an existing webpage)

property.title: Use Minime Style
property.desc: Use Minime Style or not.Trigger the Minime Style when the Width value is less then the width of the Flash Container. Always show the page-flipping eBook in Minime Style by adding a parameter to your URL like this: www.yourdomain.com/index.html?alwaysMinimeStyle=true

property.title: Width
property.desc: Trigger the Minime Style when the Width value is less then the width of the Flash Container. Always show the page-flipping eBook in Minime Style by adding a parameter to your URL like this: www.yourdomain.com/index.html?alwaysMinimeStyle=true

property.title: Height
property.desc: The Minime Style will trigger when the Width or Height of the Flash Container is less than the defined value. You can also always show the page-flipping eBook in Minime Style by adding a parameter to your URL like this: www.yourdomain.com/index.html?alwaysMinimeStyle=true .

property.title: Book Margins
property.desc: Set book margin from the flip book container

property.title: Left and Right Margins
property.desc: Set the left and right space of the flipbook.

property.title: Top and Bottom Margins
property.desc: Set the top and bottom space of the flipbook.

property.title: Show at Startup
property.desc: Set window initial show options for left panel

property.title: Large Logo Setting
property.desc: Define settings for the Large Logo

property.title: Large Logo
property.desc: The logo icon will be added in front of the bar, and the height is fixed to 55 pixels, the width will be adjusted acording to the scale.

property.title: Large Logo URL
property.desc: The page URL that will open when the user click the Large Logo

property.title: Large Logo Position
property.desc: Set Logo position for flash

property.title: Large Logo's Link Open Window
property.desc: Set large logo links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the flash.

property.title: Logo Size Setting
property.desc: Logo Size Setting

property.title: Fix Logo Size
property.desc: Fix / Not Fix the Logo Size.

property.title: Logo Fix Width
property.desc: Logo Fix Width

property.title: Logo Fix Height
property.desc: Logo Fix Height

property.title: Table Of Content Right-justified
property.desc: Table Of Content Right-justified

property.title: Flash Control Settings
property.desc: Set options for control settings in page-flipping eBooks

property.title: Security Settings
property.desc: Set security options to protect the flash page content.

property.value: Please contact the author to access the web
property.title: Password Tips
property.desc: You can customize the text for the password tips. If you want to inform readers to get the password for the flipbook with password tips, you can edit some message as the tips. Also you can lead readers to get the password tips by using the HTML link with the following format: Flip Builder
property.defalutValue: Please contact the author to access the web

property.title: Link Settings
property.desc: Link settings...

property.title: Link Color on Hover
property.desc: The Link background color when the mouse is over it.

property.title: Link Opacity on Hover
property.desc: The alpha of the link.Value should be between 0 and 1

property.title: Open Links in...
property.desc: Set hyper links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the flash.

property.title: Enable Links in Zoom Mode
property.desc: Enabel/ Disable the link when Zoom In is enabled

property.title: Google Analytics ID
property.desc: In the HTML output format, you can add statistics by using Google Analytics. You can get more infomation about Google Analytics ID from: http://www.google.com/analytics/
